channel.title: Hoster?
channel.description: can anyone host for me? i dont need a coder at all but u can help if you want... if you decide to host for me you can feel free to give yourself co-owner and give yourself anything that you want in game... skype me or message me if your interested... skype name is poppedcherries69

item.title: Hoster?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:2, topic:438173”]Rule #1 of the Server Help board:

[quote]
All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, ‘coder’/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.
[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Hoster?

All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, ‘coder’/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.
[/quote][/quote]

oh so hosting a SERVER is in the wrong section?? thats weird i could of sworn that hosting a SERVER is SERVER related… huh, i guess i was wrong

Read full topic

item.title: Hoster?
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

bruh, hoster = total owner so ur his bitch.

so ur the co-owner or less…
just host urself or buy a vps, 9$/Month u cheap ass.

anyways if u want ur server to be big, u NEED a vps for the uptime and stability, so make ur choose

1-( let someone host for u) Server that reached a maximum of 30 players online at same time, and u giving away drop party’s when there are 20+ onn.

2-(Buy vps) get atleast ( if server is normal and fun (and staff isn’t abusing power))) 50+ players online and getting a good stability wich players like.

so make ur choise, the “nubish” way, or the “smart stable” way

Read full topic
